title: aiyA nin
sahitya:
aiyA nin aDaikkalamE ambikai bhAgA


anupallavi

  meyyAi unnait-tudikkum tuyyOr-uLLattirukkum
meyyA anjal enrarut-kaiyA kailai amarnda


caraNam    dEvargat-kuyar dEvanE haranE miLirum carAcaram yAvum Inra dayALa
 ShankaranE dEva dEva krpAkarA miLir tingaL shUDiya shEkharA
 Evum vevvinaiyAkaran enai EnrukoL bhavasAgarat-tirut-
